turkish_example_sentence: Zor matematik problemini denemeyip hemen öğretmene sordu.
english_example_sentence: Without trying the difficult math problem, he immediately asked the teacher.
russian_example_sentence: Не попробовав трудную задачу по математике, он сразу спросил учителя.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Zor matematik problemini ______ hemen öğretmene sordu.
